info.name: APItude-60dayapi-week2day2
info.description:
APItude complete postman collection, with both BookingAPI & ContentAPI. You have the full details of our API in our developer portal:
https://developer.hotelbeds.com/docs?hotel

header.description: API Key used in the request
SHA256 hash in Hex format from your API Key, your secret plus current timestamps in seconds
Defines response format, posible values: application/xml, application/json
Defines type of encoding used on the data
Defines request format, posible values: application/xml, application/json

request.description:
Destination name search (please note that search by destination/zone will be activated upon request, it's not active by default). 

In 'examples' you can find different cases of requests and responses.

response.name: 1 room, 2 adults, 0 children (Availability by Destination & Zone)
